interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Store: AIFAIFA
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
Review Text: I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit. I already had a UV lamp, but I like this one better.  It is more compact and seems to work a little better. I love the polish, and all of the nail art. It is so much easier than normal polish.  I am by no means an expert, but the poly gel is the only thing that did not work for me.  I could not get it to cure.  Even after the full polish it still felt like it could crumble off at any moment.  I only did by thumbs, pinkies, and ring fingers, and the gel was broken on all of them in a couple of days.  It seemed to last a little longer on the nails I did polish as well (my thumbs).  For one day they might be okay.  But the rest of the kit makes it worth it.
Review Title: I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

UV LED Nail Lamp 120W High Power Nail Dryer for Gel Nail Polish with 4 Timer Setting 42 gel Light,Professional Auto Sensor Nail Light for Fingernail,Toenail,Home,Salon
LWQIONG
{'Brand': 'LWQIONG', 'Special Feature': 'Motion Sensor', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Plastic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene', 'Room Type': 'Office'}
I used this to put on my first set of polygel nails.  It was super easy to use and did the job as I expected it would.  The auto function was extremely handy, as was the ability to time it if I wanted.
Did the job as expected

I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit. I already had a UV lamp, but I like this one better.  It is more compact and seems to work a little better. I love the polish, and all of the nail art. It is so much easier than normal polish.  I am by no means an expert, but the poly gel is the only thing that did not work for me.  I could not get it to cure.  Even after the full polish it still felt like it could crumble off at any moment.  I only did by thumbs, pinkies, and ring fingers, and the gel was broken on all of them in a couple of days.  It seemed to last a little longer on the nails I did polish as well (my thumbs).  For one day they might be okay.  But the rest of the kit makes it worth it.
I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference**: The user has expanded their interest to include comprehensive nail kits with a focus on both functionality and variety, highlighting a preference for versatile nail care solutions suitable for DIY manicures.

- **Ease of Use**: Continues to value convenience, indicating a preference for user-friendly nail care products that simplify the application process, such as compact and efficient tools.

- **Quality and Performance**: The user emphasizes reliable performance, as seen in their positive rating despite challenges with specific product components, reflecting a willingness to overlook minor issues in favor of the overall kit's utility and enjoyment.

- **Home and Salon Use**: Maintains flexibility for both personal and professional use, suggesting an ongoing interest in providing nail care services and enhancing personal beauty routines.

- **Material Awareness**: Remains conscious of product materials, focusing on durability and functionality while evaluating the performance of new products. 

Overall, the user clearly prioritizes effective, convenient, and aesthetically pleasing nail care solutions, demonstrating a balance between personal enjoyment and functional performance, while still being open to trying new products and methods in nail enhancement.
